column4: News;Phnom Penh: A------ Chinese man used violence against his workers causing  injuries to 5 people.------The incident occurred on September 27
column6: in the village of Kouk Chambok
column8: Khan Por Senchey.------A factory worker told  TVFB that after a dispute concerning overtime payments
column9: the workers  came to the factory and went to  complain to the boss. The factory owner became angry
column11: and struck the workers.------After the incident
column12: the police also detained the factory boss to follow the legal procedure.------https://tvfb.news/article/14635------(Video gets going around 2.40 and  7.20 mark)
